value:
$nMPID_リオン|A catastrophe beyond all hope of
averting... If there were any way to
halt such a terrible thing, I'd... Hm...

$nMPID_リオン|Grado's land cannot bear enough
crops to provide a comfortable life...
but it makes us a hardy people.

$nMPID_エフラム|As you can see, Lyon is as thin as a
rail. Quite frail. So...please try to not
overwork him. I'll pick up the slack.

$nMPID_エフラム|So many Heroes around our age...
They'll soon learn that Lyon and I
are a force to be reckoned with!

$nMPID_エフラム|Lyon's great at teaching. In fact,
he taught me about our continent's
history—so I know.

$nMPID_リオン|I am Prince Lyon of Grado. This is
Prince Ephraim of Renais. It is a
pleasure to make your acquaintance.

$nMPID_リオン|Ah! That went well, didn't it,
Ephraim? I'm sure Eirika would
be proud.

$nMPID_リオン|I hope I'm able to be of some use
to you, Ephraim.

$nMPID_エフラム|Don't worry—we'll do better next
time! Trust me.

$nMPID_リオン|There is much power yet uncovered
in this world... It's amazing. I must get
out there and see more.

I'm Prince Ephraim of Renais, and
this...this is Prince Lyon of Grado.
Nice to meet you.

$nMPID_エフラム|You have my—OUR thanks...for
showing us the wonders of this
world you've brought us to.$k$pSparring with famous Heroes from
other worlds has done wonders for
my lance technique. If I keep this up...$k$p$nMPID_リオン|Now, Ephraim...you are a prince, not
a mercenary. Eirika wouldn't want
you thinking of nothing but battle.$k$pThat said, it is true that we have
learned much in this world. Its
realms, its people, its royalty...$k$p$nMPID_エフラム|Right. The more I learn, the more I
realize how little I actually know! But
that just means I can keep growing.$k$pWe hope to both keep learning here,
from you. In return, we will be your
strength, $Nu.$k$pYou can count on us!
(exertion)
(exertion)
Is that all?
Ephraim!
$nMPID_二人|We will not lose!
$nMPID_二人|Now! Yes!
$nMPID_エフラム|This is our chance!
$nMPID_リオン|Let us end it.
(exertion)
I'm sorry, Lyon...
Tread carefully...
It's all going to plan.

• It's up to you.
• I'm ready, Ephraim!

• Together,
• We win!
(exertion)

• No matter the foe, we'll win!
• I-I'll do my best.
Hmm...
We will triumph, Lyon.
Yes, Ephraim.

$nMPID_エフラム|Ah... It's no good. I can make neither
head nor tail of this.

$nMPID_リオン|Don't give up so easily, Ephraim.
You've just begun.$k$pThis is just history, of past kings.
...Would you like me to tell you
a little more?

$nMPID_エフラム|Yes, thank you. I understand things
much better when you explain them.

$nMPID_リオン|It's unusual to see you so devoted to
your studies. Did something happen?

$nMPID_エフラム|Eirika's on me to take up my books.
I spend too much time with the lance,
she says...$k$pAnd she also says that our father
would grieve to see it.

$nMPID_リオン|Aha! It's no surprise that this is all
due to Eirika's influence. I can just
picture her face...

$nMPID_エフラム|Now that you mention it... She never
gets annoyed with you, does she?

$nMPID_リオン|I suppose not. But she cares for you
much more deeply.

$nMPID_エフラム|That's not why! It's your character.
You're so kind, Lyon. It draws people
to you—including me.
$nMPID_リオン|Ephraim...

$nMPID_エフラム|*sigh* Perhaps I wouldn't struggle
so much if I were more likable.
Or cleverer—like you.

$nMPID_リオン|I'm honored to hear you say it,
Ephraim. But it is I who admires you!$k$pIf only I were so brave and strong...

$nMPID_エフラム|If only the two of us could rule
together.$k$pI would defeat our foes while you
hand down wise proclamations.

$nMPID_リオン|Perhaps... But two cannot
rule as one.

$nMPID_エフラム|Why not? I'll admit I don't know
much of statecraft, but our countries
are allied, and we are friends...$k$pI can't imagine us in opposition.
It could work!

$nMPID_リオン|Ephraim! To rule a nation is not so
simple. No, it's far too complicated...$k$pBut I am pleased to hear you say
all this.

We'll see what the future holds for
us, my friend...
